newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Foreigners accused of $8 mln Ukraine fraud.
newsitem.headline: Foreigners accused of $8 mln Ukraine fraud.

text.p: Ukrainian police have arrested a British citizen and two men from Pakistan on fraud charges, accusing them of trying illegally to cash cheques worth a total of $8 million, police said on Saturday.

Alexander Yurkov, a police officer in the eastern industrial city of Dnipropetrovsk, said the three had tried to exchange a total of 16,000 cheques drawn on an American bank. Each cheque was worth $500.
The three could face up to 15 years in prison if they are convicted. All three had denied the charges.
